reference: Figure 1: Annual Trends in E-Verify Usage Figure 1: Annual Trends in E-Verify Usage graph1 10/27/17, 9:14 AM 0 .1 .2 .3 Fraction 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 year Coverage rate Fraction queried Data source: United States Department of Homeland Security data series. Notes: This figure plots the annual E-Verify rate, defined as the number of E-Verify queries divided by the total number of new hires, and the annual fraction of all private sector hires subject to E-Verify mandates. New hires are measured using the QWI. 35 Data source: United States Department of Homeland Security data series.
